new_messages_in_first.label: Display newer messages in first
new_messages_in_first.comment: Display order of the messages in the admin ticket response form

new_message_field_in_first.label: Display new message edit field upper than the chat history

change_author.label: Change message author
change_author.comment: Author can be changed in ticket response form

change_message_type.label: Change message type
change_message_type.comment: Message type can be changed in ticket response form

display_first_message_preview.label: Display first message preview
display_first_message_preview.comment: If enabled, display a preview of the first message next to subject in ticket grid

allow_attachement_on_message.label: Allow attachements into each ticket's message

max_attachements_front.label: Max number of attachements allowed on customer forms
max_attachements_front.comment: Value accepted : between 1 and 10, else the default value 3 will be used

max_attachements_back.label: Max number of attachements allowed on admin response form
max_attachements_back.comment: Value accepted : between 1 and 10, else the default value 3 will be used

attachements_type_allowed_front.label: Type of attachements allowed on customer form
attachements_type_allowed_front.comment: Files extensions must be separated by commas

attachements_type_allowed_back.label: Type of attachements allowed on admin response form
attachements_type_allowed_back.comment: Files extensions must be separated by commas

do_not_affect_manager_on_new_ticket.label: Do not assign manager on new ticket
do_not_affect_manager_on_new_ticket.comment: Manager assignment for tickets created on front form

max_msg_download.label: Max number of e-mail to download
max_msg_download.comment: Max number of e-mail downloaded on each attempt to downlaod e-mails (by cron or by click on check messages button)

delete_email_aftersave.label: Delete email after download
delete_email_aftersave.comment: Try to delete e-mails on server after they have been successfully downloaded

delete_mail_month.label: Number of month
delete_mail_month.comment: Email downloaded older than this number of month will be purged every month by cron

date_limit.label: Download message from this date
date_limit.comment: Max date of Email to be downloaded on each attempt to downlaod mail

default_status_during_import.label: Ticket status after email import
default_status_during_import.comment: The default status defined when a mail is imported

enable_purge_table_mail_content.label: Purge the copy of the downloaded mails in database at the date specified in the folowing option
enable_purge_table_mail_content.comment: A copy of each email content is saved in the table crm_ticket_mail. With time, this table can become huge, so this option enable you to automaticaly purge the downloaded mails copy.

purge_table_mail_after_x_days.label: Purge the copy of the downloaded mails after X days
purge_table_mail_after_x_days.comment: The purge will be done every saturday nigth by a cron job

purge_table_mail_bigger_than_x_mb.label: Purge the copy of the downloaded mails bigger than X Mb
purge_table_mail_bigger_than_x_mb.comment: (Unit Mb) The purge will be done every saturday nigth by a cron job

purge_table_mail_now.label: Purge it now
purge_table_mail_now.comment: Purge the mail table now using these settings

save_too_bigmail_in_filesystem.label: Save too big mails in filesystem
save_too_bigmail_in_filesystem.comment: If you encounter some size issues in saving email the table crm_ticket_mail

max_email_size.label: Max email size allowed to receive
max_email_size.comment: in Mb, If you don't use 'Save too big mails in filesystem', you can limit the max email size allowed that must lower than your mysql setting max_allowed_packet

detect_spam_from_header.label: Detect spam from the e-mail provider informations
detect_spam_from_header.comment: Identify the incoming mail as a spam if it is identified as such by the email provider

allowed_domains.label: Domain to include
allowed_domains.comment: Select the domains to allways include in spam detection from mail provider, separated by comma

allowed_emails.label: Emails to include
allowed_emails.comment: Select the emails to allways include in spam detection from mail provider, separated by comma

forbidden_subject_keywords.label: Spam keywords list
forbidden_subject_keywords.comment: Write here a list of exclusion keywords. If they are present in the mail subject, the mail will be marked as spam. (separated by comma)

forbidden_domains.label: Domain to exclude
forbidden_domains.comment: Select the domains to allways exclude from spam detection, separated by comma

forbidden_emails.label: Emails to exclude
forbidden_emails.comment: Select the emails to allways exclude from spam detection, separated by comma

allow_product_selection.label: Associate product to ticket
allow_product_selection.comment: If enabled, you can select the product with a drop down menu (not recommended if you have many products)

allow_object_selection.label: Associate customer object to ticket
allow_object_selection.comment: If enabled, you can select order / invoice / creditmemo ... to associate to the ticket

delay_to_reply.label: Delay to reply to tickets
delay_to_reply.comment: Hours, calculate deadline adding X hours to the last client update

ticket_grid_default_status.label: Default status for the ticket grids
ticket_grid_default_status.comment: Select the status you want to display as default in the ticket grids

send_invoice_default_reply.label: Default reply assigned to the quick action Send Invoice
